collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: MEVStake is designed with privacy in mind. As a decentralized platform, we collect minimal personal information necessary for platform operation.
walletItems: Public wallet addresses for transaction processing
Transaction history related to staking activities
technicalItems: IP addresses for security and fraud prevention
Browser type and version for compatibility
Device information for optimal user experience
Usage analytics to improve platform performance

usage.title: 2. How We Use Information
usage.content: We use collected information solely for:
items: Processing staking transactions and reward distributions
Maintaining platform security and preventing fraud
Improving user experience and platform functionality
Complying with applicable legal requirements
Communicating important platform updates

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties, except:
items: When required by law or legal process
To protect our rights, property, or safety
With service providers who assist in platform operations (under strict confidentiality)
In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

blockchain.title: 4. Blockchain Transparency
blockchain.noticeText: All staking transactions are recorded on the Solana blockchain and are publicly visible. This includes wallet addresses, transaction amounts, and timestamps.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
items: Encryption of sensitive data in transit and at rest
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Access controls and authentication mechanisms
Secure infrastructure and hosting environments
Incident response procedures for security breaches

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use minimal cookies and tracking technologies:
items: Essential cookies for platform functionality
Analytics cookies to understand usage patterns (anonymized)
Preference cookies to remember your settings
cookies.cookieControl: You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain information only as long as necessary for:
items: Providing platform services
Complying with legal obligations
Resolving disputes and enforcing agreements
Maintaining security and fraud prevention

rights.title: 8. Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights to:
items: Access your personal information
Correct inaccurate information
Request deletion of your information
Object to processing of your information
Data portability

transfers.title: 9. International Transfers
transfers.content: As a decentralized platform, your information may be processed in various jurisdictions. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international data transfers.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated through the platform interface. Your continued use constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, please contact us through our official channels or community forums.
